meaningMnemonic: The <radical>bird</radical> radical and the <kanji>bird</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: Think of a run of the mill <kanji>bird</kanji>, whatever comes to mind for you first is fine. Then, your lovely bird swells. The shape of a face, then a hand, start stretching the bird apart until it explodes outward. Covered in blood and feathers is Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう).
